content: aran socks these aran socks are a perfect beginner project to improve your confidence with sock knitting this straightforward pattern will help you create your very own cosy pair of socks to keep your feet warm through the winter in this pattern the socks are knitted from the top down with a turned heel we ve used one colour of yarn for these socks but you can easily use a second colour for the cuff heel and toe to create a fun contrast twistedstitch bigcartel com designed by twisted stitch © 2023 @_twistedstitch pattern intended for personal use only sizing one size fits most adults the aran sock is quite stretchy and can be worn as a slightly oversized slipper sock on smaller feet the length of the sock is based on a measurement of the length of the foot if you re making socks as a gift you can estimate the foot length based on the shoe size the circumference can be adjusted by casting on 4 sts more or fewer for sizes outside the eu 36-43 range yarn abbreviations any aran weight wool roughly sts stitches 100g k knit p purl needles ktbl knit through back loop 4mm/us6 circular or double- sl slip pointed k2tog knit 2 together p2tog purl 2 together notions ssk slip slip knit tapestry needle 2 stitch markers pm place marker sm slip marker gauge 18sts 24 row / 10x10cm 4x4 in stockenette stitch twistedstitch bigcartel com designed by twisted stitch © 2023 @_twistedstitch pattern intended for personal use only pattern cuff turning the heel cast on 44 sts with the german row 1 ws - sl1 p12 p2tog p1 twisted cast on and join in the turn round making sure not to twist row 2 rs - sl1 k5 ssk k1 your stitches turn work in twisted rib stitch ktbl 1 row 3 ws - sl1 p6 to one p1 for 8 rounds or until the cuff before the gap created by the is your desired length last turn p2tog p1 turn calf row 4 rs - sl1 k7 ssk k1 turn work in stockinette stitch until row 5 ws - sl1 p8 p2tog p1 the calf measures 13cm/5in or turn until it is your desired length row 6 rs - sl1 k9 ssk k1 turn heel flap row 7 ws - sl1 p10 p2tog p1 work back and forth across half turn of your stitches leaving the other half on the cable of your row 8 rs - sl1 k11 ssk k1 circular needles or on a stitch holder row 1 ws - sl1 p to end row 2 rs - *sl1 purlwise k1* to end repeat row 1 and 2 until your heel flap measures 5cm/2in twistedstitch bigcartel com designed by twisted stitch © 2023 @_twistedstitch pattern intended for personal use only gusset toe round 1 -
